Hi. This is to guide you to use the app.


 You can add/remove task according to your need.
 	1. To add a task, Tap on the bottom most button with "+" symbol.
 	2. Write the task you want to add
 	3. You can set the priority as well by selecting any of the option given below the input field
 	4. You can select time as well to set a reminder at a required time
 Tap on the check box to mark the task as completed

 To check the tasks you have completed already you can swipe left.

 To mark the task as not completed you have to tap the check box in completed section
You have a Pending Task to do now
